message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe this is a good starting point for a successful negotiation.
Your offer was quite generous Alice, but let's be realistic.  I'm proposing a slightly adjusted split that reflects the time value of our deal.  We should aim to settle this quickly.
Bob, time is money, but so is fairness. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers to reach a swift and equitable agreement.
